definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: I was a slave under club and fist.
sentences.chinese: 在他們的棍棒和拳腳下，我就是一個奴隸。

sentences.english: It's a more-sophisticated version of the motion detection done today by the Wii, which gives users a wand-shaped controller to hold as they play games.
sentences.chinese: Wii現在用的一種控制器就是棍棒形狀的。

sentences.english: pigs being trampled by one another while being unloaded from a truck by a worker with a paddle;
sentences.chinese: 豬從卡車上卸下時，被工人使用棍棒驅趕而相互踐踏。

sentences.english: He seized a stick and laid to in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 他抓起一根棍棒向四下亂打。

sentences.english: They wear crudely stitched-together clothing, and use simple weapons and tools like clubs and staves.
sentences.chinese: 他們穿着粗劣拼綴的衣物，使用棍棒之類簡陋的武器。

sentences.english: Cook was clubbed to death by natives in Hawaii in 1779.
sentences.chinese: 年，科克在夏威夷被當地人以棍棒打死。

sentences.english: Spare the rod and spoiled the child.
The stick fighters of the Philippines, pulling no punches .
sentences.chinese: 菲律賓的棍棒術戰士用的是牽引而非拳術。

sentences.english: A baton used by a magician or water diviner .
sentences.chinese: 魔術師或探測水源的人使用的棍棒。

sentences.english: Thenardier noted the enormous size of the cudgel and the solitude of the spot.
sentences.chinese: 德納第望着那根粗壯無比的棍棒和那一片荒涼的地方。

sentences.english: The vultures try to move in and are prevented by waving sticks and shouts.
sentences.chinese: 禿鷲們再一次試圖靠近但被揮舞的棍棒和吆喝聲驅趕。

sentences.english: Baton of clay painted in red stripes, with imitation mace-head of clay.
sentences.chinese: 泥塑棍棒，表面塗有紅色條紋，頂端是仿狼牙棒頭。

sentences.english: Since then KuErBan sticks in hand every day for her vigil.
sentences.chinese: 從此庫爾班每天手握棍棒爲阿娜爾罕守夜。

sentences.english: I knew I was in trouble when I was taken to the garage with a rod.
sentences.chinese: 當我被人拿著棍棒趕到車庫時，我知道我惹下麻煩了。

sentences.english: I knew I was in trouble when I was taken to the garage with a rod .
sentences.chinese: 當我被人拿着棍棒趕到車庫時，我知道我惹下麻煩了。

sentences.english: The people of the village took revenge on the thieves by beating them with sticks.
sentences.chinese: 村子裏的人們用棍棒打竊賊泄恨。

definition: lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
